Up.Statement:
-- DeNAショッピング（旧Bidders）連携設定 無効 IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_MallCooperationSetting] WHERE [mall_kbn]='B' AND [valid_flg]='1') BEGIN UPDATE [w2_MallCooperationSetting] SET [valid_flg]='0' WHERE [mall_kbn]='B' AND [valid_flg]='1' END
-- DeNAショッピング（旧Bidders）カラム削除 ALTER TABLE [w2_MallCooperationSetting] DROP COLUMN [cnvid_bds_n_ins_datacsv],[cnvid_bds_n_upd_datacsv],[cnvid_bds_n_stk_datacsv],[cnvid_bds_v_ins_skudatacsv], [cnvid_bds_v_ins_skustockcsv],[cnvid_bds_v_upd_skudatacsv],[cnvid_bds_v_upd_skustockcsv],[cnvid_bds_v_stk_skustockcsv];
